Posts.EditableText: Everything is working fine now. The games were inoperable for about 2 weeks, but all are functioning and back up. The only problem that remains is the ability to save, at least as far as I know.

Posts.EditableText: It looks like saving is working again, but now saves drop you into where you save, then seem to run a buggy initialization script after, then drop back into the game, but the game buttons seem to malfunction briefly, plus the current room description no longer shows.
